topic: Names with numbers or non-desired special characters
Bad local names (roman characters in brackets)
Missing one bracket for local names
Trailing spaces in names or local names
Cyrillic/Greek alphabet used instead of Latin
Person rows with empty string gender
comment: Valid gender values are 'm', 'f', 'o' and NULL. Empty strings as value always indicate a problem (e.g. 'o' not transfered correctly, missed entry of person data, etc.) to be investigated individually.

topic: Bogus DOBs (DOBs with year outside of reasonable range)
comment: DOB's other then 00-00-0000 that are clearly not valid. 0002-11-30 is the java error that can occur whenever 0 is entered as DOB.

topic: Missing DOBs at scale (competitions after 2018 with at least 3 missing DOBs)
comment: Identification of competitions with many missing DOBs (indicating a systematic issue). Findings should be discussed in the competition's result thread.
